key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and ransomware attack
Dependence on the cyclical semiconductor industry
Integration risks from the Atotech acquisition
Legal and regulatory risks including patent litigation and compliance challenges
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging inadequate cybersecurity measures
Patent litigation with Advanced Energy Industries, Inc.
environmental_issues: Involvement in incidents flagged by Sustainalytics that may negatively impact the environment
social_issues: Potential human trafficking and slavery risks in supply chain despite strong policies
governance_issues: High leverage from acquisitions posing financial risks
Need for robust compliance with U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) and U.K. Bribery Act

sources.title: MKS Instruments hit by class-action litigation following ransomware ...
sources.snippet: MKS Instruments is facing a class action lawsuit in California in connection with a February ransomware attack that forced the company to suspend part of its manufacturing capacity, according to the company's annual 10-K filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission..
